CARDS.title: Slack DM Sender
CARDS.description: A Slack bot that allows you to send direct messages to users in your workspace, appearing as if sent by you. Ideal for automated communication.

CARDS.title: Gesture-Controlled Interactive Gaming
CARDS.description: An innovative computer vision project enabling hand gestures to control a game. Map gestures to W, A, S, D keys for a dynamic, hands-free gaming experience.
